feature_model.name: Representation
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Representation (f_Representation) :m Coordination (f_Coordination) :m Forward (f_Forward) :m RoutePlanning (f_RoutePlanning) :m Content Sharing (f_Content_Sharing) :m PowerMonitor (f_PowerMonitor) :m SecurityNotification (f_SecurityNotification) :m LocationMonitor (f_LocationMonitor) :m Distribution (f_Distribution) :m Agent (f_Agent) :m Monitoring (f_Monitoring) :m CPUMonitor (f_CPUMonitor) :o SolPlugin (f_SolPlugin) :o BluePlugin (f_BluePlugin) :o StringBased (f_StringBased) :o ACLBased (f_ACLBased) :o JadePlugin (f_JadePlugin)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_JadePlugin or f_ACLBased constraint_2:~f_BluePlugin or f_StringBased constraint_3:~f_SolPlugin or f_StringBased
